q: CEO switch, said founder and marketing vice president Michael Cohn . ''We're sad to see Eric Schmidt step down. He was a strong supporter of Google Enterprise,'' Michael Cohn said in a phone interview. But we don't have any fear with regards to Larry. However, Michael Cohn also looks forward to hearing what enterprise strategy Page plans to pursue, especially his plans for the Google Apps channel partners. In a conference call with financial analysts after the surprise announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt in April, co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena. We've touched just 1 percent of the capabilities that could be deployed in that realm, said Sergey Brin , who will head strategic projects and new products in the new management structure. Daemen College, said a need for a ''streamlined entrance'' procedure at some colleges is sorely needed. He also said VA officials need to recognize the needs of medium and small businesses for workers. The focus needs to be on how they can hire just one more person, he said. As a result, Kirsten Gillibrand told the vets that besides following up on their suggestions, she is working with local chambers of commerce to use existing tax credits that encourage hiring of veterans.

In addition, adds Mr Sergio Marchionne , the car represents all the iconic Italian values. The hope is to ramp up Fiat 500 sales to 60-65,000 cars per year. The director would give me a tap when he liked someone, but I couldn't even look up. The star admits he was forced to go to the audition, and found the whole thing very awkward. He tried not to make eye contact with any of the lovely ladies auditioning for a part.

''I do think highly of Sergio Marchionne but I was still very skeptical of the prospects initially when this all started,'' David Whiston , an analyst with Morningstar Inc. in Chicago, said prior to the release. So far, they're proving me wrong and proving nearly everyone else out there wrong. Chrysler's global sales rose to 1.5 million in 2010, the company said. Earlier this month, Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler had lowered its breakeven point to 1.5 million from its previously stated breakeven point of 1.65

and Carmelo Anthony had 14 to help the Denver Nuggets spoil Allen Iverson 's return to Philadelphia with a 93-83 win over the 76ers on Monday night. ''I just felt like I was back home,'' Allen Iverson said. It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was. The Nuggets did their share to ruin Allen Iverson 's homecoming. Denver scored the first 14 points of the fourth quarter to rally for its fourth straight win.
